General.Name: Fujian Fynex Textile Science & Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Fujian Fynex Textile Science & Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the production, processing, knitting, and weaving of dyed cloth products primarily in China. The company offers knitted fabrics, including single- sided jersey, terry cloth, jacquard, and color striped cloth fabrics; double-sided jacquard, roma cloth, interwoven, and interlayer fabrics; and ribbings comprising 1X1 ribs, 2X2 ribs, elastic ribs, transfer ribs, etc. It also provides anti-pilling flannelettes, such as single brush single, double brush double, and double brush single shakes; knitted finished fabrics comprising gray, warp knitted and shoe material fabrics; and package dyed yarn, including cotton, polyester cotton, polyester, acrylic, nylon, and viscose yarn. The company also exports its products to Hong Kong, Taiwan, the Middle East, Europe, the United States, and Japan. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Jinjiang, the People's Republic of China.

3.Name: Mr. Zhiji  Hu
